Talk0028: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Are you gonna listen to our song, mister?
Talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>You know, <sp:5:0:0>this song is about the ark that
saved Rito Village a long, long time ago.<sp:0:4:0>Something bad happened then, just like
it's happening now.<sp:0:4:0>We're practicing the song because we
think if we sing it just right, then the
<clr:0000>Stormwind Ark <clr:ffff>will save us!
Talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>It definitely is! Papa told me it's always
watching over us, high in the sky.
Talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hey there, mister!<sp:5:0:0> Here to see what's
going on in Rito Village?
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Yay! <sp:5:1:0>We love an audience, so we'll give it
our best for you!
Talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Wanna hear me sing the <clr:0000>Song of the
Stormwind Ark <clr:ffff>again?
Talk24: Everyone ready? <sp:5:1:0>A one, and a two, and...
Talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_01>I'll be practicing the song here, so let me
know if you change your mind.
Talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>♪Once, a god fell from heaven,<sp:5:0:0>
stilling the Hebra winds.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪The heavens grew lifeless,<sp:5:0:0>
just as the air below thinned.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪With the world in upheaval,<sp:5:0:0>
we pledged to help the lord.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪A line of ships soaring,<sp:5:0:0>
built as a passage skyward.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪The god ascended to heaven,<sp:5:0:0>
leaving behind an ark.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪Its winds brought us new life,<sp:5:0:0>
thanks to its great, divine spark.♪
Talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you want to hear the <clr:0000>Song of the
Stormwind Ark<clr:ffff> after all?
Talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>If you wanna hear the song after all, we'd
always be happy to sing it for you.
Talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>My sisters are all helping the adults, too,
you know!<sp:0:4:0>Isn't that grown-up of them, even though
they're still little? <sp:5:0:0>I'm so proud of them.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>I've got to keep working hard so I can set
a good example!
NpcTalk_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>It's called the <clr:0000>Song of the Stormwind Ark<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>We're all going to sing it together to save
our village from the Upheaval!
Talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You know, <sp:5:0:0>this song is about the ark that
saved Rito Village a long, long time ago.<sp:0:4:0>Something bad happened then, just like
it's happening now.
Talk0034: <sp:3:0:2:0701>And, Molli, we'll need you to make arrows.
Talk0035: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>We've all got jobs to do, so let's do 'em!
Talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Did you decide you want to hear us sing
the <clr:0000>Song of the Stormwind Ark<clr:ffff>, mister?
Talk0037: <sp:3:0:2:0700>You got here just in time, mister!
Talk0024: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Hey...that <clr:0000>Stormwind Ark<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Is it really real? I'd be so happy if it was!
Talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Did you like the <clr:0000>Song of the Stormwind
Ark<clr:ffff>, mister? I can sing it again for you if
you want.
Talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>We could sure use its help with this
awful blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>Most of the adults aren't around anymore
because of the weird weather.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, if we don't have the ark, and we
don't have the adults, it's up to us kids
to take care of the village!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Practice is over for today. Genli, you're in
charge of food.
Talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Hey! Hey, mister! You're the one who
stopped the blizzard, right? Thanks for
saving our village!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Although even now that it's calm, I still
got a lot of work to do.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_00>I still patrol the village to see if the snow
damaged anything. It's a BIG job, but I'm
pretty good at it!
Talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should listen to us sing the <clr:0000>Song of
the Stormwind Ark<clr:ffff>, mister!
Talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I'm still helping out around the village by
checking for stuff that got damaged in the
snow. <sp:5:0:0>There's never a dull moment!
Talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Then here we go! Be sure to pay attention
to the lyrics, OK?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪Once, a god fell from heaven,<sp:5:0:0>
stilling the Hebra winds.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪The heavens grew lifeless,<sp:5:0:0>
just as the air below thinned.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪With the world in upheaval,<sp:5:0:0>
we pledged to help the lord.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪A line of ships soaring,<sp:5:0:0>
built as a passage skyward.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪The god ascended to heaven,<sp:5:0:0>
leaving behind an ark.♪<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>♪Its winds brought us new life,<sp:5:0:0>
thanks to its great, divine spark.♪
